topic.title: How to use ZeroNet on TOR Newwst Version 2019?
topic.body: I'm trying the "No Proxy for" thing and i can't find this on TOR configuration

1575709869_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: i've tought something like that before too.

1575869182_1MXVsMNFA5sP6AbbVirbrjzWsMeWy.body: well... what you want to know at first? i would say to explore the sites, and kaffiene, or zoogle zearch, u can find it at the 0list

1575837926_1QB4xaPWPG3auDPmgCcPHbJeXYdC2.body:
> [reichardnixon](#comment_81_16NfWw2hgzGaVcQs35UJySKMf4YP9kZFbr): You are doing it wrong.
You are doing it wrong x2

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [korfa](#comment_16_19s3iztHV7i3fBN9wyiMhiXECoZvyNjLhr): Can not use Tor browser with zeronet after Tor browser update to 9.0. I guess I should set 'no proxy' for 127.0.0.1:43110, but can't find where I can do this in browser settings.

me too!

1575880894_1JszzaxuPyozejWGkm7VyEEkXNCj5.body:
> [ilker2445](#comment_3_14pcGcDyCeERwve6YoyvsqgYBuUjhWw7vE): Paste about:config on url bar.Set this value to 0:network.proxy.type = 0And toggle this:network.proxy.socks_remote_dns = falseYou will have to do this everytime you restart your tor browser.Good luck.

Thank you very much! It worked.

1576036634_1JxAgjsza2uoah9BWToPpA2tAUFbt.body:
> [reichardnixon](#comment_85_16NfWw2hgzGaVcQs35UJySKMf4YP9kZFbr): 

Hi! do you know if here exists private chats? or not yet?
